name: Infinity Patterns
description:
A truly unique puzzle experience that embraces simplicity, elegance, and challenge. Infinity Patterns paints a simple yet challenging puzzle game onto a sophisticated canvas of color and shapes. Test the limits of your brain by completing complex patterns to solve the puzzles.

The goal of Infinity Patterns is to strategically place the most colored lines on the board. Using forethought and strategy you must sequence your moves correctly. Over time patterns emerge and your tactics may evolve, but Infinity Patterns will keep you on your toes with increasingly difficult puzzles.

  •  Several increasingly bigger and more challenging puzzles.
  •  Beautiful patterns emerge from gameplay.
  • A simple, yet addicting game for any age.
Free, forever As Infinity Patterns' developer I believe that video games should be accessible for everyone. Therefore I hope I may bring you some joy with my app. Releases

    Please expect minor bugs as I work to iron them out.
